mapper.select: SELECT paperinfo.paperId,paperinfo.paperName FROM paperinfo,courseinfo WHERE paperinfo.isAdd=0 AND courseinfo.teacherId=#{id} AND courseinfo.courseId=paperinfo.courseId

mapper.update: UPDATE titleinfo SET titleStem=#{ti.titleStem},optionA=#{ti.optionA},optionB=#{ti.optionB},optionC=#{ti.optionC},optionD=#{ti.optionD},answerRight=#{ti.answerRight},titleinfo.analyze=#{ti.analyze} WHERE titleId=#{ti.titleId} AND paperId IN (SELECT paperinfo.paperId FROM courseinfo,paperinfo WHERE courseinfo.teacherId=#{teacherId} AND courseinfo.courseId=paperinfo.courseId)
